snippet.title: "Cave Digger 2: Dig Harder" Demo Game Play Trailer | Steam Next Fest 2021
snippet.description:
🤠⛏️Hey miners!
Cave Digger 2: Dig Harder is now available for testing during the Steam Next Fest!
We're going to have a developer broadcast looping on the store page throughout that whole week. The demo is downloadable on the game’s Steam page throughout the event, 16th - 22nd of June.
🧨 You can get a taste of its core mechanics and alternative, weird west-dieselpunk world for the first time, with the option of a cross-platform co-op multiplayer.
🧨 During the fest, the game will be streamed on Steam and on the publisher’s Twitch channel at twitch.tv/vrkiwigaming.
🧨 Cave Digger Discord channel is at discord.gg/cavedigger and to install Cave Digger 2 Steam Next Fest build, go to its Steam page at https://bit.ly/3chIMtP.
🥝 Get to know us, visit http://www.vrkiwi.org
